articles.title: US plan to exploit Venezuela’s oil could eat up 13% of carbon budget to keep 1.5C limit

articles.description: The Ottawa Senators are hoping a veteran can stabilize their situation in net. James Reimer, 37, has signed a one-year deal with an average annual value of $850,000, the team announced Monday. Reimer was signed to a professional tryout by the club last week.
